text: [Ej hamsaroni pajomʙar] agar sumo du nafar ʙa dargohi Alloh taolo tavʙa kuned [ʙa sudi sumost]; ʙe gumon, dilhojaton [az haq] munharif gastaast va agar sumo du nafar ʙar alajhi u hamdast [muttafiq] saved, [ʙidoned] ki Alloh taolo dustu jovari ust va [niz] Caʙrail va mardumoni soista – az mu'minonu faristagon – [niz] ʙa'd az on pustiʙon [madadgori u] hastand
